snuff.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: to stop a candle burning by pressing the burning part with your fingers or by covering it
snuff.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: if an animal snuffs, it breathes air into its nose in a noisy way, especially in order to smell something
snuff.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: a type of tobacco in powder form, which people breathe in through their noses
snuff.translation[1].definitions[0].exam: He took a pinch of snuff.
a snuff box  (=a small box used to keep snuff in)
